projectData.task: To reflect on an idea that if an artist is a systems architect, and not a producer of individual objects, then how to determine the ontological and legal boundaries of systems producing objects?
projectData.whyExists: The work is the code written in TidalCycles environment and executed autonomously, 8-channel audio generated in real time, and a wall projection of the code. A generative algorithm creates endless sound art piece by randomizing the combination of samples and effects.

process.title: Coding
